Package entity

Class TicketPrice

java.lang.Object
entity.TicketPrice
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TicketPrice extends Object implements Serializable
This class determines the ticket price according to different factors

    • getTicketPrice

      public double getTicketPrice(LocalDate date, CinemaClass cinemaClass, AgeGroup age, MovieType movieType)
      This method gets the final ticket price with all factors considered
      Parameters:
      date - Date of the movie
      cinemaClass - Class of the cinema
      age - Age of the customer
      movieType - Type of the movie
      Returns:
      the total ticket price
